title: How to end virus lockdowns? Technology, tests, coordination - The Associated Press
description: BERLIN (AP) — Governments battling a virus that has crossed borders with breathtaking swiftness pinned their hopes Tuesday on tests, technology and a coordinated approach to ease the tight...
